title: Dead Landes, Les escap√©s
overview: A team of journalists came to report on the departure of the vacationers at L'Escapade, a small campsite in the Landes. But suddenly, the end of the world seems to arrive, leaving the last vacationers in a total blur. Are they the last survivors of humanity? In front of journalists' cameras, they will try to survive, live together and understand what is happening to them...
